downfall:FairyPotion.NAME: Fairy Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Heals to 30% of Max HP instead of dying, removing this effect.

downfall:NeowInvulnerable.NAME: Goddess of Life
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot be killed.  Retreats to recover when reduced to 0 HP.

downfall:TotemInvulnerable.NAME: Living Wall
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot die unless all other Heads are at 1 HP.  Dies if any other Head dies.

downfall:ExhaustCardsPower.NAME: Forgetful
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, choose a card to Exhaust.

downfall:PoisonResist.NAME: Poison Resistance
DESCRIPTIONS: Poison does not bypass your Block, triggers at the end of your turn, and loses half its stack.
